title: Chapter 201: The Journey to Lir
content:

book.title: Skyfire Avenue
book.description: 天火大道, aka Skyfire Avenue, is a scifi/fantasy webnovel by popular Chinese author Third Young Master of the Tang Family, aka Tang Jia San Shao (唐家三少), the same author who wrote Douluo Dalu. This project is complete, having been finished by Xiao Lai.
